entry.title: What is Bitcoin? | Crypto 101

By now over 2 million crypto currencies have been launched, but have you ever wondered where crypto actually comes from, or what the original crypto currency was? To answer that question and a few others, today, we're diving into the oldest and most famous cryptocurrency out there—Bitcoin.
